page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: For the Domesday Project our school has been given a 12 kilometre square block North West of Bradford. This block contains: mainly farmland, two dormitory villages and woodland. The two villages:{Cottingley}and{ {Wilsden}have old established village centres which were extened with modern semi-detached houses built after the Second World War . The land in this area is mainly used as pasture for dairy cattle. To the north of the block is a {woodland } area containing deciduous and evergreen trees. Within this block there is a {filtration plant}which supplies water to most of the Bradford area.
